original_text: And their brethren, according to their generations, nine hundred and fifty and six. All these men were chief of the fathers in the house of their fathers.
korean_text: 또 그의 형제들이라 그들의 계보대로 계수하면 구백오십육 명이니 다 종족의 가문의 우두머리들이더라

sentences.original_text: And their brethren, according to their generations,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 형제들은 그들의 대대로 따라

sentences.original_text: nine hundred and fifty and six.
All these men were chief of the fathers
in the house of their fathers.
